snippet: A federal appeals court on Tuesday rejected a challenge to President Obama’s 2012 executive action granting deportation relief to immigrants brought to the United States illegally as children, upholding a lower court’s earlier ruling.
abstract: Federal appeals court in New Orleans rejects challenge to Pres Obama's 2012 executive action granting deportation relief to immigrants brought to the United States illegally as children, upholding earlier ruling; challenge was brought by state of Mississippi and group of Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Tuesday rejected a challenge to President Obama’s 2012 executive action granting deportation relief to immigrants brought to the United States illegally as children, upholding a lower court’s earlier ruling.

headline.main: Louisiana: Suit Over Deportation Relief Rejected
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Suit Over Deportation Relief Rejected

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
